backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for BioMentor AI backend, defining student profile management, trial/subscription logic, conversation history, document metadata, and practice records with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the live voice chat feature implementation, listing the affected files (VoiceChatInterface, useVoiceChat, AITutor) and associated components/test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short summaries describing each file's purpose and notable changes, serving as a build/documentation reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the BioMentor AI React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes, handles auth/trial guard logic via RootLayout, and conditionally renders the landing page or dashboard based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Persistent sidebar layout component with responsive navigation, user avatar, login button, and a collapsible mobile sidebar for authenticated and unauthenticated states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity, handling authentication state transitions and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's name and email to create their profile and start a 1-day free trial, using the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` and `useStartFreeTrial` mutations.
frontend/src/components/TrialExpiredModa: A non-dismissible modal shown when a user's free trial has expired, displaying premium plan features and an upgrade CTA priced at â‚¹499/month.
frontend/src/components/VoiceChatInterfa: A voice chat UI component that renders a microphone button, animated waveform, status badge, and transcript scroll area to support real-time voice interactions with the AI tutor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, trial status checks, conversation history management, and study materials operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceChat.ts: A React hook that manages a voice chat session using the Web Speech API, handling speech recognition (listening), AI response generation (thinking), and text-to-speech playback (speaking) with a transcript history.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Sora fonts, configures Tailwind CSS with custom OKLCH-based design tokens for light/dark themes, and defines utility classes for chat bubbles, animations, and typography.
frontend/src/lib/bioAI.ts: Client-side module that simulates AI biology tutoring by returning hardcoded, detailed educational responses based on keyword matching in the user's question, covering topics like DNA replication, photosynthesis, and cell division.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with React Query's QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdaptiveLearning.tsx: A page component that displays a student's weak biology topics, generates adaptive practice questions for selected topics, tracks answers, and shows a personalized revision plan based on past practice records.
frontend/src/pages/AITutor.tsx: A page component providing an AI biology tutor interface with both text chat and voice chat tabs, displaying conversation history, suggested questions, and formatted AI responses stored via backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: The main dashboard page that shows a personalized welcome header, subscription/trial status, practice statistics, weak topics, and navigation cards linking to all major app features.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentUpload.tsx: Page for uploading biology documents (PDF/PPT) that displays uploaded documents as cards with mock AI analysis (mechanisms, exam highlights, pathways) and supports delete/expand actions via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ExamQuestions.tsx: Page that lets users select a biology topic and question type, then generates and displays exam questions (2-mark to 10-mark, MCQ, etc.) with toggleable model answers using the bioAI library.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page for BioMentor AI showcasing six feature cards and a hero section with an Internet Identity login button that initiates the authentication flow.
frontend/src/pages/Mentorship.tsx: Mentorship page with four selectable categories (textbooks, study strategy, exam prep, career guidance) that renders static markdown-like content from the bioAI library using a custom ContentRenderer component.
frontend/src/pages/NotesGenerator.tsx: Page where users enter a biology topic and optional content to generate a NoteSet (detailed notes, revision, bullets, mechanisms, definitions) displayed across tabs with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including fonts, OKLCH-based color palettes (teal, amber, semantic tokens), border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes, with typography and container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing an AI-powered biology tutoring web platform, listing architectural notes, known issues, and all implemented features with their requirement IDs and versions.
